Just a little intro about myself. I'm working on commercial spam 
filtering software which utilizes neural networks along with 
statistical methods. The neural networks part is based on article "A 
Neural Network Classifier for Junk E-Mail" of Ian Stuart et al. 
(http://www.csis.pace.edu/~ctappert/srd2004/paper05.pdf). The current 
implementation includes fixed topology Multi-layered Perceptron, and 
NEAT approach is currently testing to gain the best of neural world.

- Alex
